resources.string: Could we get to know you a little better?

This short game (~1 minute) let\'s us learn a little bit more about you so we can better secure your device. Indicate below whether you would like to play the game or not, but keep in mind there is no way to come back to this screen, for security reasons.

Type using our custom keyboard anywhere on the phone. You may need to enable the keyboard in Settings. When you\'re done, come back here and press the Send Data to Server button to send your typing data to a server that runs locally on your computer (http://localhost:5000). To delete all history of your typing patterns and start fresh, press the Clear Data button.

Type the italicized text as seen below. Do not try to type faster than normal, because the profile of your behaviors will be incorrect. When you are done typing the text, press DONE.\n\nThis will surely become my favorite app because it is so cool. The security it provides is way better than using a simple passcode.
